item.title: Roblox Adds Parental Controls After Claims It Compromises Child Safety
item.description: Videogame company has denied the allegations and says the new protections were planned before a short seller’s report.

item.description: Investors hope the Trump administration will make tech acquisition deals easier.

item.title: Inside Big Tech's Bid to Sink the Online Kid Safety Bill
item.description: Tech giants and their allies are leaning on culture-war issues to splinter bipartisan support for the bill.
